data.text:
It's been a few days since Tamamo Cross' Selection Race, but I 
can't help thinking back about that last exchange we had…
data.processed:
<story>It's been a few days since Tamamo Cross' Selection Race, but I 
<story>can't help thinking back about that last exchange we had…

data.text:
…Yer, a rookie trainer ain't ya? Ya got no experience or even 
results to yer name, how 'bout resolve?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>…Yer, a rookie trainer ain't ya? Ya got no experience or even 
<story>results to yer name, how 'bout resolve?

data.text:
Believin' in my victory, trainin' me, and winnin' 
G1s! The resolve ta be th' best in Japan! Do 
ya really have tha' kinda resolve?!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>Believin' in my victory, trainin' me, and winnin' 
<story>G1s! The resolve ta be th' best in Japan! Do 
<story>ya really have tha' kinda resolve?!

data.text:
…believing in her chances at victory, and having that much 
resolve. At that time, I couldn't comprehend that strength.

choices.text: (I want to speak with her properly next time…!)
choices.processed: <size=35>(I want to speak with her properly next time…!)</size>

data.processed:
<story>…believing in her chances at victory, and having that much 
<story>resolve. At that time, I couldn't comprehend that strength.

data.text:
I made up my mind and started searching for Tamamo 
Cross. I looked all around the academy until I 
finally made it to the Training Course-
data.processed:
<story>I made up my mind and started searching for Tamamo 
<story>Cross. I looked all around the academy until I 
<story>finally made it to the Training Course-

data.text: Haa… haa… haa…!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>Haa… haa… haa…!

data.text:
I found Tamamo Cross alone, running deperately, 
as if she was possessed.
data.processed:
<story>I found Tamamo Cross alone, running deperately, 
<story>as if she was possessed.

data.text: Haa… ku, Aaaaaaaaaaah!!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>Haa… ku, Aaaaaaaaaaah!!

data.text: Haaa… haa… haa… Damnit… This ain't like me…!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>Haaa… haa… haa… Damnit… This ain't like me…!

data.text: Ah, yer-
data.name: Tamamo Cross

choices.text: About before, I wanted to talk-

data.processed: <story>Ah, yer-

data.text: -I'm sorry about before!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>-I'm sorry about before!

data.text:
Ya went out of yer way and chased after me, tried ta talk to me, 
and I jus' flipped out on ya. Fer that… I'm sorry!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>Ya went out of yer way and chased after me, tried ta talk to me, 
<story>and I jus' flipped out on ya. Fer that… I'm sorry!

data.text:
…I just couldn't take no more. "As it is, you can't win", is 
probably what they think of me… cuz of my half-assed run.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>…I just couldn't take no more. "As it is, you can't win", is 
<story>probably what they think of me… cuz of my half-assed run.

data.text: -cuz of my height, most people one-sidedly underestimate me.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>-cuz of my height, most people one-sidedly underestimate me.

data.text:
[That physique is a disadvantage] [Best in Japan is reckless] 
[Set a more realistic goal], things like that.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>[That physique is a disadvantage] [Best in Japan is reckless] 
<story>[Set a more realistic goal], things like that.

data.text:
Tha's why, I wanted ta prove it at th' Selection Race. 
That I'mma… Uma Musume that can "Win like hell".
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>Tha's why, I wanted ta prove it at th' Selection Race. 
<story>That I'mma… Uma Musume that can "Win like hell".

data.text:
But… as ya saw earlier. With some lame runnin' 
I lost, again… I was restricted.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>But… as ya saw earlier. With some lame runnin' 
<story>I lost, again… I was restricted.

data.text:
Th' reason I came a knockin' on th' gates of this academy, was 
cuz I had a dream that I had ta fulfill in th' Twinkle Series.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>Th' reason I came a knockin' on th' gates of this academy, was 
<story>cuz I had a dream that I had ta fulfill in th' Twinkle Series.

data.text:
To do that, just runnin' ain't enough. Winnin', 
and winnin' like hell! Witha roar o' wind and light, 
loud enough ta overturn th' heavens.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>To do that, just runnin' ain't enough. Winnin', 
<story>and winnin' like hell! Witha roar o' wind and light, 
<story>loud enough ta overturn th' heavens.

data.text:
…Sorry. I wanna practice a bit more. 
Next time, I'll win th' Selection Race fer sure. That's why-
data.name: Tamamo Cross

choices.text: If it's you, you'll win the Selection Race.
choices.processed: <size=41>If it's you, you'll win the Selection Race.</size>

choices.text: If it's you, you'll win the Selection Race.
choices.processed: <size=41>If it's you, you'll win the Selection Race.</size>

data.processed:
<story>…Sorry. I wanna practice a bit more. 
<story>Next time, I'll win th' Selection Race fer sure. That's why-

data.text:
…th' heck are ya sayin'? 
I don't need yer pity, if that's what yer doin'.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>…th' heck are ya sayin'? 
<story>I don't need yer pity, if that's what yer doin'.

data.text:
Y-ya saw my last race didn't ya?! 
With tha' lame run… I just got marked as an also-ran!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>Y-ya saw my last race didn't ya?! 
<story>With tha' lame run… I just got marked as an also-ran!

data.text:
I talked a big game, but in th' end, it was jus' talk… 
Even now, I've got… no inkling of what I ought to be doin'…
data.name: Tamamo Cross

choices.text: Your desire to win, is second to none
Your desire to win, is second to none

data.processed:
<story>I talked a big game, but in th' end, it was jus' talk… 
<story>Even now, I've got… no inkling of what I ought to be doin'…

data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>…!

data.text:
She was more frustrated than anyone, but also had the strongest 
desire to win. That quality was much more necessary than being 
blessed with a good physique.
data.processed:
<story>She was more frustrated than anyone, but also had the strongest 
<story>desire to win. That quality was much more necessary than being 
<story>blessed with a good physique.

data.text: -Especially if your goal is to win and become Japan's best.
data.processed: <story>-Especially if your goal is to win and become Japan's best.

data.text:
…what? Jus' by seein' me run once, and chattin' 
with me a bit, how can ya be so sure…?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>…what? Jus' by seein' me run once, and chattin' 
<story>with me a bit, how can ya be so sure…?

data.text: Yer… a weird guy.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>Yer… a weird guy.

data.text:
…Hey, let's move somewhere else. It's startin' 
ta get cold, and we stand out like a sore thumb 
just chattin' away here. Sound good?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>…Hey, let's move somewhere else. It's startin' 
<story>ta get cold, and we stand out like a sore thumb 
<story>just chattin' away here. Sound good?

data.text:
It felt like Tamamo Cross' mood had lightened a bit. 
I nodded, and we changed locations.
data.processed:
<story>It felt like Tamamo Cross' mood had lightened a bit. 
<story>I nodded, and we changed locations.

data.text: Just now, ya said that someone like me could win, right?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>Just now, ya said that someone like me could win, right?

data.text: If yer willin' to say that much… then prove that I can win.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>If yer willin' to say that much… then prove that I can win.

data.text:
Honestly, on my own, I feel like I'm at my wit's end. 
But I wanna win! No matter what…!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>Honestly, on my own, I feel like I'm at my wit's end. 
<story>But I wanna win! No matter what…!

data.text: Tha's why, right now… I'll take my chances with ya.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>Tha's why, right now… I'll take my chances with ya.

data.text:
I'll see if ya can live up ta yer words, to 
yer resolve. In exchange, I'll show ya that 
I'm an Uma Musume tha' can really win.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>I'll see if ya can live up ta yer words, to 
<story>yer resolve. In exchange, I'll show ya that 
<story>I'm an Uma Musume tha' can really win.

data.text:
It'll be one of those "provisional contracts", I'll be troublin' 
ya until the next Selection Race… I'll show ya-
data.name: Tamamo Cross

choices.text: I look forward to working with you!

data.processed:
<story>It'll be one of those "provisional contracts", I'll be troublin' 
<story>ya until the next Selection Race… I'll show ya-

data.text:
-what I can- wait! So fast! Ya didn't let me finish! Have ya 
never heard about this thing called th' tempo of a conversation?!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>-what I can- wait! So fast! Ya didn't let me finish! Have ya 
<story>never heard about this thing called th' tempo of a conversation?!

data.text: Frank, ain't ya?! It's embarassin'!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>Frank, ain't ya?! It's embarassin'!

data.text:
But, well… thanks! It kinda happened fast, but, 
I'll be relyin' on ya startin' tomorrow!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>But, well… thanks! It kinda happened fast, but, 
<story>I'll be relyin' on ya startin' tomorrow!

data.text:
And so, following Tamamo Cross' suggestion, we formed a 
"provisional contract" for her Selection Race revenge match.
data.processed:
<story>And so, following Tamamo Cross' suggestion, we formed a 
<story>"provisional contract" for her Selection Race revenge match.

data.text: The next day, Tamamo Cross' first training day-
data.processed: <story>The next day, Tamamo Cross' first training day-

data.text:
-Well then, what's up first? 
Show me what ya got for me.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>-Well then, what's up first? 
<story>Show me what ya got for me.

data.text:
I desperately spent last night making a training 
menu tailored for her in preparation for her 
Selection Race, which I showed her.
data.processed:
<story>I desperately spent last night making a training 
<story>menu tailored for her in preparation for her 
<story>Selection Race, which I showed her.

data.text:
This…… is a lot of stuff. And it's so detailed…… You didn't make 
all of this yesterday, did you?
data.name: Tamamo Cross

choices.text: I was happy to sign a tentative contract.
choices.processed: <size=41>I was happy to sign a tentative contract.</size>

data.processed:
<story>This…… is a lot of stuff. And it's so detailed…… You didn't make 
<story>all of this yesterday, did you?

data.text: Frank, ain't ya?! Yer so direct, it's makin' me worry!!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>Frank, ain't ya?! Yer so direct, it's makin' me worry!!

data.text:
But, it's gettin' me fired up. I can tell yer serious too. 
-Alright, let's get going! No slackin'!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>But, it's gettin' me fired up. I can tell yer serious too. 
<story>-Alright, let's get going! No slackin'!
